entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
"My Administration will always stand against violence, mayhem, and disorder.

We will stand with the family of George Floyd, with the peaceful protestors, and with every law-abiding citizen who wants decency, civility, safety, and security." https://t.co/Wxk6qmBR69
